Articles.Content: I am so glad to join this forum, hope to be a little help and... well.... HI! xD
Hi santiagokof, and welcome to our forum.
Pleased to meetcha, Santiagokof! Welcome to what is, quite possibly, one of the best gaming communities I've ever seen.

Welcome to KSP Forum! Here are some tips of how to do some things:

1. "Forum Actions" - "Edit Profile" - Here you can edit some of your profile such as, change your email (you will receive an email, click on it, click the first link, and you will now be able to use your profile after you have changed your email), change your password, change your profile picture, change your avatar, edit your signature, edit your biography.

2. To edit more easily and more simple, go to "My Profile", "About", than click on the pencil to edit your stuff more simple than going to "Edit Profile".

3. Just in case, to add a link, for adding posts, copy the link, click the earth with pin in front of it (be sure not to press the earth with the pin and the X in front of it), paste the link and press

"OK".

4. To edit your post, click "Edit Post". To edit your title, disable automatic smiley faces and enable them, and to show your signature and to not show your signature and more, click "Go Advanced".

Once again, welcome to KSP Forum santiagokof!

Edited October 22, 2014 by CDK
